THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
17.01.2024, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Bia
2024/KER/4640
BECHU KURIAN THOMAS, J.
Cri.M.C.No.460 of 2024
Dated this the 17" day of January 2024
ORDER

Petitioner challenges an order refusing to discharge the petitioner under Section 239 of
the Cr.P.C.

2. The remedy of a person aggrieved by an order refusing to discharge is to prefer
a criminal revision petition.

Therefore, reserving the liberty of the petitioner to invoke the revisional jurisdiction
against the impugned order, dated 03.01.2024, this Crl.M.C. is dismissed. The Registry shall
return certified copy of the impugned order to the petitioner, immedietly.

BECHU KURIAN THOMAS
JUDGE
